text: Hi all, I may take a ML/DL online course during holiday period. Which are the trends, and which will benefit more someone like me who work in computer vision and love Julia. Is fastai the best choice?

elements.text: Hi all, I may take a ML/DL online course during holiday period. Which are the trends, and which will benefit more someone like me who work in computer vision and love Julia. Is fastai the best choice?

text: I've been hearing this term quite a lot, but still couldn't figure what it means. What is FastAi exactly?

elements.text: I've been hearing this term quite a lot, but still couldn't figure what it means. What is FastAi exactly?

text: It's a kind of portal/community/course/book/library about deep learning. I think this is pretty self-explanatory: <https://www.fast.ai/about/>

elements.text: It's a kind of portal/community/course/book/library about deep learning. I think this is pretty self-explanatory:

text: And there is a port to Julia <https://github.com/FluxML/FastAI.jl>

elements.text: And there is a port to Julia

text: I'm indeed going (trying) with FastAI. <http://Deeplearning.ai|Deeplearning.ai> is free for 7 days only, and the existence of FastAI.jl is a huge plus

elements.text: is free for 7 days only, and the existence of FastAI.jl is a huge plus

text: FastAI.jl is still a work in progress, but a lot of the pieces are broken out and work/being-worked-on. FluxTraining.jl (callbacks and training loop), Dataloaders.jl, ParameterScheduler, etc. At some point, they'll all be worked into the FastAI.jl umbrella

elements.text: FastAI.jl is still a work in progress, but a lot of the pieces are broken out and work/being-worked-on. FluxTraining.jl (callbacks and training loop), Dataloaders.jl, ParameterScheduler, etc. At some point, they'll all be worked into the FastAI.jl umbrella
